game_name: Outcasts of Dungeon Magic World Rogue Simulator
game_description: Being in the role of a brave wanderer, help dwarfs to defend their kingdom fortress from a rampaging mob of beastly invaders. Captured dwarfs need help, and they have something to offer you as a reward. Battle enemies through a story-based campaign across dungeon and evolve your combat skills to achieve better results. Features: - Procedurally generated dungeons – Twisting passages, long halls and wide-open chambers all need a hero to clear them. - Story-based Campaign – Fend off monsters across acts to discover the mysterious power behind their relentless assaults. - Companion System - Free and protect allies from captivity and use their combat power to your advantage. - 9 Different Enemies – Including scavengers, ghouls and a whole bunch of ugly orcs.
